alert.note: Alert for Clay; Crawford; Effingham; Jasper; Richland (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 4:28AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Crawford, southern Jasper, western Richland, Clay and Effingham Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 427 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Iola, or 16 miles northwest of Flora, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Louisville and Bible Grove around 440 AM CDT. Flora around 445 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Sailor Springs, Ingraham, Clay City, Noble and Schnell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 142 and 159. Interstate 70 between mile markers 82 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
